message: Hello Bob, I'm interested in selling my product to you. I believe it would be highly beneficial to your operations. I'm proposing an initial offer of $1,150,000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,050,000. This is the maximum I am willing to pay for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $1,050,000 is significantly below its true value and what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,100,000?  This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,080,000. Can you meet me at this price?
